resolution.description: Work has been completed on this issue.
resolution.name: Done

issuetype.description: Created by Jira Software - do not edit or delete. Issue type for a user story.
issuetype.name: Story

customfield_17200.name:
Submit [ServiceNow](https://aptiv.service-now.com/sp?id=sc_cat_item&sys_id=cbb0a5881b32251084f164e0b24bcb75) Request form to configure for your project
>>
**Note:** when you click on the ServiceNow request form link for the first time, you will get an error message like :The Page You are looking for could not be found. Ignore this message and click on the link for the second time and you will be redirected to the Jira custom fields page on ServiceNow.

customfield_16602.name: The Persona is identified and defined
Complete Acceptance criteria has been defined
Story is built as per the requirements
Code review checklist completed by developer
Testing has been completed and there are no defects
Product Owner accepts the story and adds comments

fields.customfield_11028: The issues mentioned in the descriptions are fixed and coreFw2.7.3 is released.
fields.description:
The below issues have to be fixed in the release 2.7.3:-
 # Regression: missing ACF related files for Linux_x86 platform
 # Linker errors: on adding correct ACF libs, CoreControlHandler seems to be having a missing library while linking.
